resources.string:
Make setup fast and easy by using your Fitbit profile! 
Just tap to enable, sign into your Fitbit account, and 
we will use the information you already provided to 
Fitbit to create your Thermos Smart Lid app profile. 

Your hydration stats will automatically be synced 
from your Thermos Smart Lid app to your Fitbit 
account each time you finish a bottle of water.
